mapper.select: select id_review from review where id_user = #{id_user} and active = 1 order by update_date desc limit 1

select r.id_review as id_review, r.id_store as id_store, r.content as content, r.score as score, r.upload_date as upload_date, r.update_date as update_date, u.nickname as nickname from review r join user u using(id_user) where id_review = #{id_review} and r.active = 1
mapper.insert: insert into review (content, id_user, id_store, score, upload_date, update_date) values (#{content}, #{id_user}, #{id_store}, #{score}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: update review set content = #{content}, score = #{score}, update_date = current_timestamp where id_review = #{id_review} and active = 1
update review set active = 0 where id_review = #{id_review} and active = 1
mapper.select: select count(id_review_like) from review_like where id_review = #{id_review} and active = 1
mapper.update: update review_like set active = case when likeCheck = 1 then 0 when likeCheck = 0 then 1 where id_review = #{id_review} and id_user = #{id_user}
mapper.select: select id_review, id_user, id_store, store_name, score, content, upload_date, update_date, likeCnt from review as r join store using(id_store) where id_store = #{id_store} and r.active = 1 order by upload_date desc
select count(*) from review where id_store = #{id_store} and active = 1
select id_review from review where upload_date = #{upload_date} and active = 1
select store_name from store where id_store = #{id_store} and active = 1
